name: Danmaku ~ Fusion Omega
description:
This is an entry to the LÖVE-Jam 2.

I made this game in about 30 ~ 35 man hours. I hope you enjoy it!

Basic Idea:

Shoot enemies and avoid being shot.
After defeating a boss, you fuse with it and gain it's attack.

Controls:

Up - Move Up
Down - Move Down
Left - Move Left
Right - Move Right
Z - Shoot
Shift - Focus (Slows down time)
